{{Description|A small road cuts through these dense and deep woods.<br />The fluttering sound of leaves blown by the wind in this place were often mistaken for whispers by travelers.<br />This is why they started naming it "Whispering Woods."|[[Expedition]] description}}

'''Whispering Woods''' is a subarea in [[Starfell Valley]], [[Mondstadt]] near [[Starfell Lake]] and the [[City of Mondstadt]]. It is the location where the [[Traveler]] first meets [[Venti]] and [[Dvalin]].
